attributes.action: raise the minimum wage for under eighteens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is not fair that under 18's have such a small minimum wage when they have the right to become parents and get married. I think that all ages should be standardised, in that, either under 18's get a proper wage, or that only 148's and over can become parents.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
